title: Anyone interested in entering the tournament at PAX?
body:
There's a LoL Tournament on Saturday, 5 pm. Signups probably at 9, anyone feel like entering for fun and playing?

I'm a top laner and a rag tag team sounds like it might be fun if people were gonna be there.

replies.body: Yes im a plat adc and I have a mid laner with me here in Melbourne, I really wanna get a team together :)

Would but, cant go.
Cant afford ticket + stay.
